first_para: David Henry Rutley (born 7 March 1961) is a British Conservative Party politician. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Macclesfield, and was first elected at the 2010 general election.

full.extract: David Henry Rutley (born 7 March 1961) is a British Conservative Party politician. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Macclesfield, and was first elected at the 2010 general election.
full.title: David Rutley
